sentences.english: Don't expose it to hot objects to prevent wielding slag from spilling on ribbon heater.
sentences.chinese: 不要與高溫物體接觸，防止電焊熔渣濺落到電熱帶上。

sentences.english: Once it has cooled, this slag can be used to make bricks or to pave roads.
sentences.chinese: 一旦冷卻，這種熔渣就可以用來制磚或者鋪路。

sentences.english: Quick reverse tilt the ladle to remove slag from the pouring spout.
sentences.chinese: 快速顛倒鋼水包從包裏倒出熔渣。

sentences.english: The main materials of producing silica fertilizer are the cinder of yellow phosphorus and melted blast furnace.
sentences.chinese: 硅肥生產的主要原料是黃磷渣和高爐熔渣。

sentences.english: Soldering could cause numerous of spattered sparks and fused dregs.
sentences.chinese: 焊割作業有大量的火星飛濺和熔渣。

sentences.english: Average foams life, has been presented as criterion to evaluate the foaming behavior in mol-ten slag.
sentences.chinese: 提出平均發泡壽命作爲熔渣發泡效果的實驗評價指標。

sentences.english: The fusibility of coal ash was different with that of slag.
sentences.chinese: 煤灰與熔渣的熔融特性存在一定差異。

sentences.english: During the steel metallurgy, the phenomena of slag bubbling up is very prevalent.
sentences.chinese: 在鋼鐵冶金過程中，熔渣的起泡現象是非常普遍的。

definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
